I moved because I wanted to be closer to my new love.
i dyed my hair pink.
i am very good at math and science.
I joined a new gym near my home in New Mexico to continue my athletic pursuits.
My dog is my best friend and the only one who can tolerate my clumsiness.

content.text: Hi there! I'm new in town and looking for friends. What's your name?
Hi there! Welcome to New Mexico! My name is participant_2. What's yours?
My name is participant_1. It's nice to meet you, participant_1. I'm actually from California but I just moved here a few months ago to be closer to my new love.
That's awesome! I'm originally from Texas but I've been living in New Mexico for about 10 years now. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to do math and science. I'm also a huge animal lover. I have a dog named Buddy who is my best friend.
That's great! I'm a teacher so I love to learn new things. I also love animals. I have a cat named Mittens.
Oh my gosh! I love cats! I used to have a cat named Mittens too.
That's so funny! What's your favorite thing to do in New Mexico?
I love going hiking in the mountains. The views are amazing! What about you?
I love going to the movies. There's a great movie theater in Albuquerque.
I love going to the movies too! What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is The Princess Bride.
That's a classic! I love that movie too!
It's so good! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's nice to meet you, participant_1. I think we're going to be great friends.
I think so too! Let's hang out sometime soon.
Sounds good! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Great! I can't wait to see you again.
